alert.note: Alert for Massac (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 08 at 11:10PM CDT until May 09 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Massac County in southern Illinois... Central Carlisle County in western Kentucky... McCracken County in western Kentucky... Northern Graves County in western Kentucky... * Until midnight CDT. * At 1110 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles southwest of Karnak to near Barlow to near Wickliffe, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Paducah, Metropolis, Bardwell, Reidland, Lone Oak, Brookport, Barkley Regional Airport, West Paducah, New Columbia, Kevil, Joppa, Lowes and Symsonia. This includes the following highways... Interstate 24 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 1 and 17. Interstate 24 in Illinois between Mile Markers 26 and 38. Interstate 69 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 31 and 34. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
